functional_jobs.job_statement: When I receive a message about leaks that need to be looked at, I want to respond promptly, so I can address the issues and provide assistance.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Returning calls and managing messages via phone.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Misplacing messages leads to delayed responses and potential dissatisfaction from clients.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Improve response time and ensure all client messages are addressed in a timely manner.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Clients feel acknowledged and issues are resolved quickly.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I realize I have delayed my response, I want to feel competent and reliable, so I can maintain my professional reputation.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Apologizing for the delay and explaining the situation.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Feeling anxious about potentially disappointing clients due to delays.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Feel more in control of communication and confident in managing client relationships.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Clients express understanding and appreciation for my efforts.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I interact with clients, I want to be perceived as trustworthy and responsive, so I can build strong professional relationships.
social_jobs.pain_points: Being seen as unresponsive or disorganized due to misplaced messages.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Establish a reputation for reliability and professionalism in my field.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Clients refer me to others based on their positive experiences.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I manage client communications, I want to organize messages effectively, so I can keep track of all client needs.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Using a phone and manual note-taking.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in keeping track of multiple messages leads to lost information.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Implement a system that allows for better message tracking and organization.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: All client messages are accounted for and responded to without delays.
